Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute at Pershing/Damen
ShortDescription: 39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via Pershing, Ashland, 43rd, and Western: due to, street blockage near Pershing/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via Pershing. Ashland, 43rd, and Western: due to, street blockage near Pershing/Damen.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Adams/Wabash and Indiana
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Adams/Wabash and Indiana due to fire department activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Adams/Wabash and Indianan due to fire department activity.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between 63rd Ashland/63rd Cottage to Indiana, and,
  • between Harlem/Lake and Adams/Wabash, 

Shuttle busses have been requested between Adams/Wabash and Indiana.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes #3 King Drive or the # 4 Cottage Grove, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
